# RFP for Pre-Qualification of End User Computing Service Providers

## Title
Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Pre-Qualification for End User Computing Services
## Number
MX-42864354050
## Amendment
This is an amendment to the original RFP, dated [insert date]
## Title French
Demande de Proposition (DP) – PRÉQUALIFICATION POUR DES SERVICES D’INFORMATIQUE D’UT
## Amendment Date
10 October 2023
## Closing Date
10 October 2023, 16:00:00 hours CST
## Notice URL
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2616016325/abstract?language=EN
## Notice URL French
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2616016325/abstract?language=FR
## Contracting Entity
Farm Credit Canada (FCC)
## Solicitation Number
PS23-AG-014
## Publication Date
14 September 2023
## Descriptive Information
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) apply to this procurement.
## Evaluation and Award Methods
This is a competitive bid solicitation with no pre-determined value. The procuring entity will evaluate tenders based on a combination of factors, including price, delivery schedule, and quality of goods or services provided. The most responsive bidder will be awarded the contract.
## Pre-Qualification Requirements
Eligible companies must demonstrate their experience and qualifications in provision of end user computing services, such as mobile device management, end user computing, hardware procurement, managed print services, application management services, application maintenance and SaaS support services.
## Responsibilities
The selected provider will be responsible for providing comprehensive end user computing services, including but not limited to:
   * Mobile device management
   * End user computing
   * Hardware procurement
   * Managed print services
   * Application management services
   * Application maintenance
   * SaaS support services
## Evaluation Criteria
The Evaluation Criteria are divided into three (3) main categories:
1. Firm Demonstrated Experience (FDE): This category will be used to assess the Firm's capability and past performance in delivering the scope of services listed in paragraph 3, "Scope of the RFP".
2. Price Proposal Accuracy (PPA): This category will be used to evaluate the merit of the Firm's Pricing Proposal.
3. Qualifications
